isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - ADJUSTMENTS - CAB AIR SUSPENSION (9100 DAY CAB MODELS)

svcproc.title: CAB AIR SUSPENSION (9100 DAY CAB MODELS)
svcproc.para: To adjust cab ride height, measure ride height between the bottom of the cab mounting bracket and the top of the crossmember mounting bracket ( Figure 80). If dimension does not meet specified height of 5-3/16 inches ± 1/16 (132 mm) for 9100 day cab with single bag system, adjust as necessary using the following procedure.

step1.para: Remove one end of the height control valve linkage ( Item 4, Figure 112), loosen jam nut ( Item 7, Figure 112) and adjust accordingly. Tighten the jam nut on the valve linkage.
The height control valve arm ( Item 5, Figure 112) has a slot ( Item 6, Figure 112) which will allow for coarse adjustment also.
